trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects for equivalence by using value-based comparison.
This class implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> interface and uses value-based semantics to compare <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects.

This class is required because the default implementations of some set-based operations (such as <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Distinct%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A>, and <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Except%2A>) use reference-based semantics to compare <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object references, instead of comparing the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object values.
The <xref:System.Data.DataRowComparer%601.Default%2A> class is used to compare the values of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects and does not compare the object references.
This class cannot be directly instantiated.
Instead, the <xref:System.Data.DataRowComparer%601.Default%2A> property must be used to return a singleton instance of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowComparer%601.Default%2A> class.
This class is stateless.
This class is sealed and cannot be derived from.
The type of objects to be compared, typically <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
Gets a singleton instance of <xref href="System.Data.DataRowComparer`1"></xref>.
This property is read-only.
This property is read-only.
An instance of a <xref href="System.Data.DataRowComparer`1"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects by using a column-by-column, value-based comparison.
The schema of the two <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects is not checked.
If both <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects have exactly the same ordered set of column values, they are considered equal.
Only the current values of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects are checked.
The state of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects is not checked.
The <xref:System.Data.DataRowComparer.Equals%2A> method is the value-based comparison implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601.Equals%2A> method.
The first <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> object to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> object to compare.
`true` if the two <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects have ordered sets of column values that are equal; otherwise, `false`.
One or both of the source <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects are `null`.
Returns a hash code for the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.Data.DataRowComparer%601.GetHashCode%2A> method is the value-based comparison implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601.GetHashCode%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to compute the hash code from.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> value representing the hash code of the row.
The source <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects does not belong to a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
The source <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects is `null`.
